org.greatage.ioc.proxy
Interface ProxyFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractProxyFactory, CGLibProxyFactory, JavassistProxyFactory, JdkProxyFactory
public interface ProxyFactory

This class represents utility producing proxy creation around object builders that instantiates the actual object only as needed with all configured method advices.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Ivan Khalopik

Method Summary
<T> T
createProxy(ObjectBuilder<T> objectBuilder, List<MethodAdvice> advices)
          Creates proxy around specified object builder that instantiates the actual object only as needed with all configured method advices.
 

Method Detail

createProxy

<T> T createProxy(ObjectBuilder<T> objectBuilder,
                  List<MethodAdvice> advices)
Creates proxy around specified object builder that instantiates the actual object only as needed with all configured method advices.

Type Parameters:
T - type of proxy object
Parameters:
objectBuilder - object builder
advices - method advices
Returns:
proxy around specified object builder
Throws:
RuntimeException - if proxy creation is impossible or if an error occurs instantiating it
